attributes.action: Begin a judge led public inquiry into the handling of the Brexit omnishambles.
attributes.additional_details: Under the Inquiries Act 2005, this petition calls upon the government to investigate the events and serious public and business concerns of this process. The tribunal of inquiry should cover the red lines, the decision to call and frame the referendum, the failure of the process, the costs, the advice given to stakeholders, the negotiating strategy and the involvement of the devolved powers and opposition parties.
attributes.background: Since the June 2016 referendum there has been a catastrophic failure by the government of its policy and its handling of the Brexit process and negotiations. The outcome has made the UK an International laughing stock. The government’s failure is squarely down to it's own leadership.
